divs: Sighting Details1. senior prom sitting on a bench looking over a huge country club golf course. 2. I was looking at the sky and i saw it and asked my girlfriend next to me why she thinks that the plane didnt have and blinking lights. 3. A plane with no lights then i realized what i saw wasnt a plane. 4. moving in a straight line and the it just faded out, out of nowhere. 5. excited ive always wanted to see a ufo. since i am very intrested in ufos i look alot to the sky. 6. it just disappeared, i watched it fade out quickly
trends: There have been no other sightings in Baiting Hollow
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: glowing light moving faster then plane, just disappeared
